text: Hagi nagra kini ne' Nebukatnesa'na e'inahu ava'na ke'noanki, kagra Belsasaga ana ava'namofo agafa'a eri ama hunka nasamio. Na'ankure ruzahu ruzahu antahi'zane vahe'ma nagrama kegavama hu'noa mopafima mani'naza vahe'mo'za ana ava'namofo agafa'a eri amara hu'za nasamigara osu'naze. Hianagi kagra eri ama hunka nasamigahane, na'ankure ruotage'ma hu'naza anumzantamimofo avamumo kagrane mani'ne.
